meta.details: Manage payment methods with a straightforward UI layout featuring shadcn/ui Card, Button, and Tooltip components. Card brands are clearly identified, sensitive information is partially hidden for security, and editing/deleting functions are easily accessible. Includes a call-to-action button for adding new payment methods. Perfect for account settings, billing pages, and checkout flows.
